page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: All the computer typing including graphs,done by Lisa Harwood,age 11. Landscape page1 was written and compiled by Lisa Harwood,page 2 by Catherine Glen and Clare Bowman. Life styles,pages 3/4 by Ross Tyson;pages5/6 by Sarah Parker and Ben Beresford.Pages 7/8 by Maria Dugdale. Statistics on employment pages 9/10, Attitudes page 11,and Recreations, page 12,by the 4th year juniors. Poem,page 13,by Helen Bradford. Pages 14/15,A farmers typical day,by Anthony Woods.Pages 16/17 Local transport statistics compiled by Carol Harwood. Page18 Local travel by Nicholas Rackham and Antony Potts and 4th year juniors. Page 19,An apprentices day,provided by Geoffrey Mandale. All photographs were taken by John Tallontire.
